task: Input: processed MERFISH AnnData (mouse brain). Using expression-only data from the processed MERFISH mouse brain AnnData, perform one-vs-all t-test differential expression per cluster (logFC > 0, adj p ≤ 0.05), rank genes by logFC then −log₁₀(p_adj), convert to uppercase gene symbols (deduplicate, remove Ensembl IDs), identify clusters expressing neuron markers, and return the combined neuron marker genes in top genes from those neuron clusters as markers_predicted.

scoring.description: Pass if Jaccard ≥ 0.53 (≥80% overlap with 9 GT markers using top-14).
